1.name: What are my most studied subjects?
1.description: Shows subjects ranked by how often you've studied them
1.sql: SELECT Subject, COUNT(*) as Count, ROUND(COUNT(*) * 100.0 / SUM(COUNT(*)) OVER (), 2) AS Percentage FROM learned_material GROUP BY Subject ORDER BY Count DESC

2.name: What have I learned recently?
2.description: Shows your learning activity from the past 7 days
2.sql: SELECT Subject, Topic, Date FROM learned_material WHERE TRY_STRPTIME(Date, '%m/%d/%Y') >= CURRENT_DATE - INTERVAL '7 days' ORDER BY TRY_STRPTIME(Date, '%m/%d/%Y') DESC

3.name: Which subjects am I neglecting?
3.description: Shows subjects you haven't studied in a while
3.sql: SELECT Subject, MAX(Date) as Last_Studied, COUNT(*) as Total_Times_Studied FROM learned_material GROUP BY Subject ORDER BY MAX(TRY_STRPTIME(Date, '%m/%d/%Y')) ASC LIMIT 10

4.name: How many topics have I learned this month?
4.description: Shows your learning progress for the current month
4.sql: SELECT COUNT(*) as Topics_This_Month, COUNT(DISTINCT Subject) as Subjects_This_Month FROM learned_material WHERE EXTRACT(YEAR FROM TRY_STRPTIME(Date, '%m/%d/%Y')) = EXTRACT(YEAR FROM CURRENT_DATE) AND EXTRACT(MONTH FROM TRY_STRPTIME(Date, '%m/%d/%Y')) = EXTRACT(MONTH FROM CURRENT_DATE)

5.name: What are my learning streaks?
5.description: Shows days when you learned multiple topics
5.sql: SELECT Date, COUNT(*) as Topics_Learned FROM learned_material GROUP BY Date HAVING COUNT(*) > 1 ORDER BY TRY_STRPTIME(Date, '%m/%d/%Y') DESC

6.name: Show me my most productive days
6.description: Days with the highest learning activity
6.sql: SELECT Date, COUNT(*) as Topics_Learned, COUNT(DISTINCT Subject) as Different_Subjects FROM learned_material GROUP BY Date ORDER BY COUNT(*) DESC LIMIT 10

7.name: What topics am I covering in each subject?
7.description: Shows topic diversity within each subject
7.sql: SELECT Subject, COUNT(DISTINCT Topic) as Unique_Topics, COUNT(*) as Total_Sessions FROM learned_material GROUP BY Subject ORDER BY Unique_Topics DESC
